title: E-commerce Website
description: A fully functional e-commerce website built with modern technologies like React.js and Node.js. Includes features such as product search, user authentication, and payment integration.

title: Mobile Task Manager App
description: An intuitive mobile app for task management, allowing users to create, prioritize, and organize tasks on the go. Developed for both iOS and Android platforms using React Native.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets. Utilizes libraries like D3.js and Plotly.js to create interactive charts and graphs, enabling users to gain insights from their data.

title: Smart Home Automation System
description: An IoT-based solution for automating home appliances and security systems. Integrates with smart devices such as thermostats, lights, and cameras, allowing users to control their home remotely.

title: Social Media Analytics Tool
description: A powerful tool for analyzing social media trends and sentiment. Integrates with APIs from major social media platforms to gather real-time data and provides insights through advanced analytics.

title: Online Learning Platform
description: An online platform offering courses on various subjects such as programming, design, and business. Features include video lectures, quizzes, and interactive assignments.
